REUTERS.UNKNOWN: E A f1436 reute r f BC-TORONTO-DOMINION-AUST 04-09 0042

TEXT.TITLE: TORONTO DOMINION AUSTRALIA DOLLAR BOND INCREASED
TEXT.BODY: Toronto Dominion Bank, Nassau Branch, has increased its eurobond offering to 50 mln Australian dlrs from 40 mln, lead manager Hambros Bank Ltd said. All other terms remain the same. REUTER
